HomePage.howItWorksStep1: We create a public "tinymind-blog" repository in your GitHub.
HomePage.howItWorksStep2: Your new blog and thoughts will be automatically saved in this repository.
HomePage.howItWorksStep3: Your data is stored only on GitHub, independently of this site.

metadata.title: TinyMind - Write and synchronize your blog posts and thoughts with GitHub one-click login
metadata.description: Write and preserve your blogs, thoughts, and notes easily. Sign in with GitHub to automatically synchronize your content with your own repository. Your ideas are stored safely as long as GitHub exists.
